title: Looking to join ranked team
body: Hey, I'm looking to join a ranked team and have been for a while since i left my old one, we got up to gold extremely easily and i enjoyed playing with a consistent group of people and getting rewarded for it. I mainly play top but i can be flexible in the mid lane, if anyone is interested please feel free to shoo me a msg as I'm online often (except during school hours) IGN: Pandadude123
